							                    Craniopharyngiomas
							                    Treatment of craniopharyngiomas may include the following:         -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor.    - Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible, followed by radiation therapy.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with adult craniopharyngioma. For more specific
